definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="randomDrop">randomDrop</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">A block is broken</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:randomDrop</field><comment pinned="false" h="49" w="235">This makes the variable "randomDrop" have a random number.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:randomDrop</field><comment pinned="false" h="53" w="272">This tests if the variable's random number is equal to or greater than 0.5 (50% chance)</comment></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="56" w="178">This tests if the block being broken is a grass block.</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.TALLGRASS#1</field><comment pinned="false" h="36" w="198">Set this to be a tall grass block.</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="178">This tests if the block being broken is a fern block.</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.TALLGRASS#2</field><comment pinned="false" h="35" w="167">Set this to be a fern block.</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><comment pinned="false" h="67" w="160">If the conditions are true then the block will drop seeds when it's broken.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:KaleSeeds</field><comment pinned="false" h="50" w="169">Set this to drop your crop seeds.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
